bgu.csp.az.api
Class Message

java.lang.Object
  bgu.csp.az.api.Message
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleMessage
public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A base class for SimpleMessage and AbstractMessage it defines the most basic features that a message should have (a sender, a name and some more staff). Messages can contain metadata that can be used for passing data about the message like timestamp, statistics etc. â€“ some metadata is filled automatically by the simulator and some can be added by the algorithm.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
static int DISCARDED
          optional flag -> means that this message is descided to be discarded (the agent should ignore it..)
protected  int flag
          the collection of flags this message flagged with (bitmap)
protected  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> metadata
          the attached metadata for the message you can use it to send any kind of data that is not part of the message fields think about it at the content on the envelop of the message - you may want to write the timestamp there etc.
static int OLD
          optional flag -> means that this message is irelevant (most of the time because its time stamp is too old)
static boolean USE_DEEP_COPY
          a temporary flag this flag will get deprecated after all the algorithms will be transformed to work with deep copy
